USER: Hello

USER: It won't be possible now madam, I don't have the amount right now. I am in a lot of trouble now.

AGENT: No

AGENT: Okay sir, when sir? I need more time, more time.
USER: I need more time, I will do it next month, madam.
AGENT: Next month, it won't be possible this month, sir.
USER: No madam, I have a lot of problems now. I have lost everything now. I don't have a single rupee now. If I get the amount, I will clear it next month.
AGENT: Sure. Thank you.
USER: Okay.
